# Gamma UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Activity Dropdown](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/activity-dropdown): A modern activity/notification dropdown with smooth animations and responsive motion.
- [Animated List](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/animated-list): A dynamic list component with smooth animations that forms a column and scrolls through items continuously.
- [Badge](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/badge): A flexible and customizable Badge component for labels, statuses, and indicators.
- [Border Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/border-button): A reactive border animation button that follows cursor movement using Framer Motion and CSS masks.
- [CPU Architecture](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/cpu-architecture): A fully animated CPU architecture SVG component with dynamic paths, gradients, and optional CPU connections.
- [Inverted Cursor](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/inverted-cursor): A smooth, animated custom cursor component with blend mode effects.
- [Live Waveform](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/live-waveform): A customizable live audio waveform visualizer using the Web Audio API.
- [Logo Cloud](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/logo-cloud): A responsive logo grid component supporting dark mode, decorations, and flexible layout.
- [Logo Timeline](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/logo-loop): A looping logo marquee component with horizontal and vertical motion, hover effects, fading edges, and responsive behavior.
- [Logo Timeline](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/logo-timeline): A multi-row infinitely scrolling logo timeline built with Motion One, supporting hover-activated animations and row grouping.
- [Macbook Keyboard](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/macbook-keyboard): Interactive animated MacBook keyboard component.
- [Magnetize Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/magnetize-button): A magnetic particle-attraction button built with Framer Motion.
- [Overlay Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/overlay-button): An animated gradient button using Framer Motion with looping motion and spring transitions.
- [Pixel Button](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/pixel-button): A pixelated button animation effect built with Tailwind CSS and React.
- [Plasma](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/plasma): A mesmerizing plasma shader animation rendered with WebGL, perfect for dynamic backgrounds and previews.
- [Pricing Interaction](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/pricing-interaction): An interactive pricing switcher with animated numbers, selectable plans, and monthly/yearly billing modes.
- [Radial Intro](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/radial-intro): A dynamic radial orbit animation built with Motion and React, featuring upright spinning image nodes.
- [Rest API](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/rest-api): A beautifully animated REST API visualization component with SVG paths, glowing lights, badges, and interactive motion effects.
- [Support Box](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/support-box): A collapsible animated support widget for quick help actions using Framer Motion.
- [Text Roll](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/text-roll): A rolling hover-animated text component built with Motion One.
- [Wave Path](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/wave-path): A dynamic interactive SVG wave component that responds to pointer movement.
- [Wavy Text Block](https://gamma-ui-delta.vercel.app/docs/components/wavy-text-block): A scroll-triggered wavy text animation component that creates flowing motion effects using Framer Motion and scroll context.

## Examples

- [Live Waveform Demo](https://github.com/mazyar-kawa/gamma-ui/blob/main/registry/example/live-waveform-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Support Box Demo](https://github.com/mazyar-kawa/gamma-ui/blob/main/registry/example/support-box-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Overlay Button Demo](https://github.com/mazyar-kawa/gamma-ui/blob/main/registry/example/overlay-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Border Button Demo](https://github.com/mazyar-kawa/gamma-ui/blob/main/registry/example/border-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
